question: 距離
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>distance</kanji> that is <kanji>detach</kanji>ed from the distance is the <vocabulary>distance</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>range</vocabulary>. Just think of one part of the distance, stretch it out, and then look at it. It shows the distance and range!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
